text: The Dominican Republic competed at the 2015 Summer Universiade in Gwangju, South Korea with 10 competitors in 3 sports. The sprinter Luguelín Santos was the flagbearer. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" style="font-size:95%" |- ! Medal ! width=350px| Name ! Sport ! Event !
